page.title: 10Work 2 Shobdon and Byton
page.content:
We asked the 41 people who worked {how they got to work. 12 walked to work, 23 went by car, 2 went by bus, 1 went by moped, 1 went by motor-bicycle and 2 cycled to work.
We also asked them{what sort of work they did and{if they enjoyed it. 11 work in agriculture 8 in an office 5 in domestic work 4 in restaurants/ cafes/ pubs 4 in shops 4 in factories 3 as mechanics 2 self employed { Most people (37) liked their work. One person liked it "sometimes "and three people did not like their job.
